page.title: 04Work.N.Runcton,Middleton.
page.content: The great majority of inhabitants of the village work in the factories, shops, and offices in{Kings Lynn. There is very little employment available in the villages themselves. In Middleton the{school}employs four teachers and a secretary and there is a{petrol station}which employs four people.The Crown{public House}employs three people but none of them live in the village.The{village shop}in Middleton employs one lady who lives in the village.The garage in Middleton did employ people but is now closing down because of declining business. North Runcton has no employers except the farmers and the sports club. The{farms}were the main employers until about 40 years ago but now many farms are worked without any hired help and few farms employ more than two or three men.
